code: import{DataTypes}from"sequelize";import db from"../database/db.js";var User=db.define('register',{id:{type:DataTypes.INTEGER,autoIncrement:true,allowNull:false,primaryKey:true},nama:{type:DataTypes.STRING,allowNull:false,validate:{notNull:{args:true,msg:"You must enter a name"}}},email:{type:DataTypes.STRING,allowNull:false,validate:{notNull:{args:true,msg:"You must enter a email"}}},password:{type:DataTypes.STRING,allowNull:false,validate:{notNull:{args:true,msg:"You must enter a password"}}}},{timestamps:false,tableName:'register'});export default User;
